medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, chills and subjective fevers.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was previously admitted for a ruptured appendix, treated with bowel rest and antibiotics. After no improvement, she returned for further evaluation. Symptoms include abdominal pain, chills, and subjective fevers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), Gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD); Previous surgery: tubal ligation.
